title: What do Extinction Rebellion want from their protests - and where in London are they taking place?
text:
London could once again be brought to a standstill this week, as the eco-justice protest group, Extinction Rebellion, have begun their two week campaign to blockade the streets around Westminster.

But who are they, what are their aims and how will you be impacted?

Who are Extinction Rebellion?

Extinction Rebellion is an international protest group founded on the basis of “non-violent civil disobedience”, which aims to force politicians and the government to act on the issue of climate change.

It is a volunteer led movement, with no paid staff, and it is not a registered company.
